text: Click to email this to a friend ( Opens in new window ) Another “ Bachelor ” couple has called it quits — this time after just two months of being engaged. Clare Crawley and Benoit Beauséjour - Savard, who met on “ The Bachelor Winter Games, ” announced the end of their relationship in a joint statement on Instagram Thursday. “ It ’ s with a heavy heart that we have mutually decided to end our relationship, ” the statement read alongside a photo of the couple ’ s feet. “ We think the world of each other, and we were both hoping we could make this work. I ’ m sorry that this may not be what you want to hear, but it ’ s our truth. ” The post continued : “ Just know there are no negative feelings here, we
